author: brianf
msg: MPMD-43 : added build output of pmd failures. based upon patch by Steven Neuhauser.

author: marvin
msg: Add redirection of stderr, via _chaz_run utility, which is built using
chaz_Core_write_file().  Refactor a lot of Core.charm.

author: sichen
msg: Allow specifying ship group when creating order adjustments in editorderitems.  Force a recalcOrderTax after createOrderAdjustment so that new adjustments get taxed correctly.  Fixes bug where new shipping adjustments are not taxed correctly.

author: djencks
msg: simple cxf example deploys without error... dunno if it works

author: chirino
msg: - The response correlator is a thread safe Transport layer, it should not be protected by the MutexTransport
- Consolidated the Java time to DateTime logic int the DateUtils class
- Clear up the in the NMS doco that message timestamps are in UTC
- Our messages now report the timestamps in UTC
- Protect against a NPE if the ExceptionListener is not set on the connection
